  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.preference.Preference.OnPreferenceChangeListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, MonitoringContract.SettingsView, BaseView<MonitoringContract.Presenter>

    public class MonitoringSettingsFragment
extends android.preference.PreferenceFragment
implements MonitoringContract.SettingsView, android.preference.Preference.OnPreferenceChangeListener
    Display list of Preference objects. Android 3.0 (API level 11) and higher.

      • bindPreferenceSummaryToValue

        private void bindPreferenceSummaryToValue(android.preference.Preference preference)
        Attaches a listener so the summary is always updated with the preference value. Also fires the listener once, to initialize the summary (so it shows up before the value is changed.)
